entities.name: house of gaunt
entities.description: The House of Gaunt is a family known for their habit of marrying their own cousins. They squandered their family gold several generations before Marvolo was born.

entities.name: marvolo
entities.description: Marvolo was left in squalor and poverty with a nasty temper, arrogance, and pride.

entities.name: merope gaunt
entities.description: Merope Gaunt is the mother of Voldemort. She fell in love with Tom Riddle Senior.

entities.name: tom riddle senior
entities.description: Tom Riddle Senior was a handsome Muggle who used to go riding past the Gaunt cottage and had an affair with Merope Gaunt.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the son of Tom Riddle Senior and Merope Gaunt.

relationships.description: The House of Gaunt is Marvolo's family.
Tom Riddle Senior is Voldemort's father.
Merope Gaunt had an affair with Tom Riddle Senior.
